mapper.insert: insert into t_community (useridx, commtype, title, content, regDT, modifyState, modifyDT, delState, delDT, hit) values (#{useridx}, #{commtype}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), 0, NOW(), 0, NOW(), 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE t_community SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: select * from t_community where idx < #{idx} order by idx desc limit 1
select * from t_community where idx > #{idx} order by idx asc limit 1
